question.text: Fusion of <math><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></math> with <math><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></math> in presence of <math><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></math> produces a salt <math><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>.</mo></math> Alkaline solution of <math><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi></math> upon electrolytic oxidation yields another salt <math><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi><mo>.</mo></math> The manganese containing ions present in <math><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi></math> and <math><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi><mo>,</mo></math> respectively, are <math><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math> and <math><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi><mo>.</mo></math> Correct statement(s) is (are)

options.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math>  is diamagnetic in nature while  <math><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi></math>  is paramagnetic
Both  <math><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math>  and  <math><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi></math>  are coloured and have tetrahedral shape

In both  <math><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math>  and  <math><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi><mo>,</mo></math>   <math><mi mathvariant="normal">π</mi></math> -bonding occurs between  <math><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi></math> -orbitals of oxygen and  <math><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi></math> -orbitals of manganese.

In aqueous acidic solution,  <math><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math>  undergoes disproportionation reaction to give  <math><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi></math>  and  <math><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>.</mo></math>

solution.text:
MnO2+2KOH+12O2 →ΔK2MnO4(W)+H2O
Oxidation state +6
Paramagnetic and green colored salt
→ shape : Tetrahedra of anion MnO42-

Purple coloured and tetrahedra shape
